bioconda.name: recentrifuge
bioconda.summary: Robust comparative analysis and contamination removal for metagenomics.

biocontainers.summary: Robust comparative analysis and contamination removal for metagenomics

biotools.summary: Robust comparative analysis and contamination removal for metagenomics.

bioschemas.name: Recentrifuge
bioschemas.summary: Robust comparative analysis and contamination removal for metagenomics.

galaxy.summary: "With Recentrifuge, researchers can analyze results from taxonomic classifiers using interactive charts with emphasis on the confidence level of the classifications.In addition to contamination-subtracted samples.Recentrifuge provides shared and exclusive taxa per sample,thus enabling robust contamination removal and comparative analysis in environmental and clinical metagenomics."
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: Robust comparative analysis and contamination removal for metagenomics.
